00019 /**
00020  * This function is automatically called in case you are trying to use a
00021  * class/interface which hasn't been defined yet. By calling this function the
00022  * scripting engine is given a last chance to load the class before PHP
00023  * fails with an error.
00024  *
00025  * @see http://php.net/__autoload
00026  * 
00027  * @param  $sClassName @type string The class name.
00028  * @throws Exception if class name is empty, the current path is empty or class
00029  *         file does not exists or file was loaded but class name was not found.
00030  */
00031 function __autoload($sClassName)
00032 {
00033     if (empty($sClassName)) {
00034         throw new Exception('Class name is empty');
00035     }
00036     
00037     $sPath = dirname(dirname(__FILE__));
00038     if (empty($sPath)) {
00039         throw new Exception('Current path is empty');
00040     }
00041     
00042     $sFile = sprintf('%s%s%s.php', 
00043         $sPath, DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, 
00044         str_replace('_', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $sClassName)
00045     );
00046     if (!is_file($sFile) || !is_readable($sFile)) {
00047         throw new Exception("Class file '{$sFile}' does not exists");
00048     }
00049 
00050     require_once $sFile;
00051 
00052     if (!class_exists($sClassName, false) && !interface_exists($sClassName, false)) {
00053         throw new Exception("File '{$sFile}' was loaded but class '{$sClassName}' was not found in file");
00054     }
00055 }
